official_title: To provide for planning, design, construction, furnishing, and equipping of a Riverside School for the Arts in Riverside, California.
short_title: Riverside School for the Arts Act of 2000
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: Riverside School for the Arts Act of 2000 - Directs the Secretary of Education to award a matching grant to a Partnership for the costs of the design, construction, furnishing, and equipping of the Riverside School for the Arts, to be located at a site to be determined by the Riverside Community College District, within the City of Riverside, California.Requires the Partnership to: (1) consist of the Riverside Community College, the University of California at Riverside, and the Riverside County Office of Education; and (2) execute a memorandum of understanding concerning construction timelines and program development phases.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Riverside School for the Arts Act of 2000
To provide for planning, design, construction, furnishing, and equipping of a Riverside School for the Arts in Riverside, California.
